title: Feedback Mechanism
desc: Allow students to provide feedback on the website's content, usability, and features to continually improve the platform.

title: Coding Libraries
desc: Provide code snippets, algorithms, and example projects for different programming languages and domains.

title: Internship and Job Listings
desc: Partner with companies to post internship and job opportunities relevant to engineering fields

title: Online Courses
desc: Collaborate with industry experts to offer online courses on in-demand skills like programming languages, data analysis, project management, etc.

title: Coding Challenges
desc: Host coding challenges and hackathons to enhance coding skills and problem-solving abilities.

title: Mental Health Resources
desc: Offer articles, videos, and resources related to stress management, anxiety, and mental well-being.

title: Personal Development Blogs
desc: Provide content on time management, productivity, leadership, and personal growth.

title: Event Calendar
desc: List academic and extracurricular events, workshops, seminars, and conferences happening on campus.

title: Student Organizations
desc: Showcase various student clubs and organizations to foster networking and community involvement.
